snippet: Justin Gatlin won the 100 meters in 9.94 seconds at the Herculis meet, edging his countryman Dentarius Locke.
abstract: American sprinter Justin Gatlin wins 100 meters at Herculis meet in Monaco, indicating that he may be toughest rival for Jamaica's Usain Bolt at World Championships.
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin won the 100 meters in 9.94 seconds at the Herculis meet, edging his countryman Dentarius Locke.

headline.main: Gatlin Wins 100 Meters in Monaco, Leading 1-2 Finish by United States
